work.name: Headstarter AI
work.summary: Spent my freshmen year summer learning the SDLC implementation
highlights: Built backends for 3 AI apps using Python, OpenAI, and Stripe API with 98% accuracy seen by 1,000 users.
Developed projects from design to deployment leading 2+ engineering fellows using MVC design patterns
Coached by Amazon, Bloomberg, and Capital One engineers on Agile, CI/CD, Git, and microservice patterns

work.name: New Jersey Institute of Technology
highlights: Designed a swarm robotic localization system using Python (Pymunk, Pygame) to optimize robot positioning algorithms, resulting in a 25% reduction in localization error.
Collaborated with students to apply data analysis and visualization techniques to real-world robot datasets.

work.name: New Jersey Institute of Technology
work.summary: Managing large datasets and developing software to streamline department events efficiently.

projects.name: Echoes (Demo)
projects.summary: Echoes is an iOS app that helps people who can't speak or hear communicate easily. It works without the internet.
highlights: Building an iOS app with Swift and Core ML for seamless communication via text-to-speech and speech-to-text
Implemented a locally trained AI model for on-device document processing and intelligent responses

projects.name: Neptou - The Tourism Bud (Demo)
projects.summary: An IOS app that helps international tourists in Nepal explore safely and have the best experience.
highlights: Engineered Neptou‚Äôs mobile architecture using Swift and Google Maps API, implementing scalable location-based services and integrated SOS system
Pitched the project at Nepal Tourism Board.

projects.name: Ask Me Badminton
projects.summary: A Chatbot that has the most recent information about the badminton world.
highlights: Programmed an AI-powered chatbot for real-time Badminton news updates using LangChain, Next.js, Vercel, andOpenAI, enhancing response accuracy with web scraping and vector embeddings
Implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system that helped in real-time info

projects.name: Terminal Asteroids game (Demo)
projects.summary: A space game inspired by the Star Wars movie.
highlights: Created a console-based Asteroids game in C++, leveraging OOP and physics to create realistic gameplay
Designed a toroidal mapping system and optimized collision detection, enhancing gameplay responsiveness

projects.name: LoFi Steampunk Generator(Demo)
projects.summary: Helps music creators learn chords through visual patterns and sound
highlights: React for building an interactive UI with reusable components
Tone.js & standardized-audio-context for audio synthesis and cross-browser sound control
CSS & GitHub Pages for steampunk-themed visuals and easy deployment

volunteer.summary: Created a non-profit organization in Nepal during the 2020 pandemic. Led 30+ active members, completed 20+ major community projects, and helped 300+ families in need.
highlights: By 2030, we aim to help 2,000+ families in need. We donate food, clothes, stationery items, menstrual kits, etc.
We focus on assisting homeless families, orphaned children, senior citizens, and others in need.
